Text:
Anyone downoaded? A/V? (the sound especially)
Cheers mates!!
It's scheduled for release Sept. 28.  Can this be what it claims to be?

More importantly, did they get the subtitles right this time: English subs for non-English dialogue only.  I was getting tired of German SRT subs overlaid on Russian hard coded subs for a guy speaking French.

At least I was able to read the German subs. :-)
This is a top-quality torrent. Subs are in English (where needed) not German like half the others. Format is Widescreen, AR is 1280x544, exceptional quality. Download this one and you're good!
